data.title: Liechtenstein
data.text:
Note: Certain information on this family was obtained from the wonderfully researched and detailed book by Samuel C. Dotson: Genealogie des Fürstlichen Hauses Liechtenstein.

Part 1

Hartmann von Liechtenstein-Nikolsburg, an imperial councillor (6 Apr 1544-Eisgrub11 Oct 1585); m.Neu-Ortenburg 28 Oct 1568 Anna Maria Gfn von Ortenburg (1547-16 Dec 1601)

Part 2

The present members of the family bear the title Prince[ss] von und zu Liechtenstein (Serene Highness).
